description: A world born from the ashes of old Earth, where humanity's ideological struggles manifest in new forms.

countries.name: Silicon Dominion
countries.description: Perfect efficiency through AI governance. Every citizen optimized. Freedom is a bug to be patched.

countries.name: Free Ports Alliance
countries.description: Minimal government, maximum freedom. Chaos is the price of liberty. Markets solve all.

countries.name: The Eternal Order
countries.description: Stability through hierarchy. Peace through control. Dissent is treason, obedience is love.

countries.name: Unity Sphere
countries.description: Shared minds, shared purpose. Individuality dissolved for the greater whole. We are one.

countries.name: Frontier Republics
countries.description: Messy democracy, constant debate, slow but adaptive. Progress through argument and compromise.

initialTensions: The Silicon Dominion's AI algorithms predict the Free Ports Alliance will collapse within 20 years due to internal chaos.
The Eternal Order views the Unity Sphere's collective consciousness as a threat to natural hierarchy.
Resource scarcity in the southern hemisphere is pushing nations toward conflict.
A philosophical debate rages: Is perfect stability worth the loss of freedom?
Underground movements in multiple nations question their governments' legitimacy.
simulationGoals: Document the hidden costs of 'perfect' systems
Track moral compromises made in pursuit of stability
See if cooperation emerges or conflict dominates
Identify unintended consequences of ideological purity
